detailsData.title: Award-Winning Litigators
detailsData.content: Our attorneys offer decades of experience and a strategic, thorough approach to assist you with your unique business-related concern or dispute. We have built our trusted reputation through many years of proactively identifying potential litigation risks.

detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: At Arnold & Clifford LLP, we focus on business litigation and trial practice for both individual and corporate clients in both state and federal courts. Our lawyers have been recognized for excellence in their fields by numerous professional organizations.

detailsData.title: Client Commitment
detailsData.content: Whatever your legal issue, our attorneys are well-prepared and able to provide a plan forward. We are dedicated to our clients, putting in the time and effort it takes to get the best possible result.

detailsData.title: Significant Courtroom Victories
detailsData.content: Our trial lawyers have won numerous significant cases, including the largest wrongful death verdict to date in Franklin County and one of the highest Consumer Sales Practices Act awards rendered in Ohio.
